posts.name: Max Radermacher
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.47 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group.

Release notes:

  • This update fixes a bug that briefly caused the launch screen to appear with a bright background even when the Dark theme was selected. If you were inspired by Valentine’s Day and want to turn the lights down even more, we recommend candlelight.
  • Now when you send a quick reply to a specific message by long-pressing on a Signal notification, your response will be sent as a quoted reply.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.46 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.47.0.618-beta

67 new commits since 7.46.0.614-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.47 [1]

  • Update iPad transfer choice screen [2]

  • Use the correct year specifier for Attachment formatting [3]

  • Fix "show more" for non-parent edit history items [4]

  • Fix Launch Screen background color for dark theme [5]

  • Show nav bar for media items when fully zoomed out [6]

  • remove unused objc compat [7]

  • do not play leave join sounds in group calls while app is active [8]

  • Show megaphone for new linked devices when notifications are disabled [9]

  • Quote-reply when responding via a notification action [10]

  • OWSChatConnection: Cancel in-progress libsignal connects on disconnect [11]

  • OWSChatConnection: Make regular /v1/keepalive requests for auth chat […] [12]

  • Include StorageService.networkError in isNetworkFailureOrTimeout […] [13]

  • remove DonationSubscriptionManager objc compat [14]

  • remove MessageStickerDraft objc compat [15]

  • remove MessageTimestampGenerator objc compat [16]

  • remove unused method in MessageSendLogObjC [17]

  • remove unused objc compat methods from MessageReceiptSet [18]

  • remove unused objc compat NSDate extensions [19]

  • remove Date.isBefore(_) and Date.isAfter(_) extensions [20]

  • remove unused NSLocale extension [21]

  • remove unused objc compat extension on NSRegularExpression [22]

  • remove unused objc compat extension on NSUUID [23]

  • remove unused objc compat on NotificationCenter extension [24]

  • remove unused objc compat from OWSBackgroundTask [25]

  • remove unused objc compat on OWSChatConnection [26]

  • remove unused OWSDeviceObjc class [27]

  • remove objc compat from OWSError [28]

  • remove unused objc compat code in OWSFormat [29]

  • remove unused objc compat code in OWSIdentityManager [30]

  • remove unused objc compat code in OWSLinkPreview.swift [31]

  • remove unused objc compat code in OWSMediaUtils [32]

  • remove unused objc compat in OWSMockSyncManager [33]

  • remove unused objc compat code on OWSRetryableSubscriptionError [34]

  • remove unused objc compat class OWSSignalServiceObjC [35]

  • remove unused objc compat code on OWSSyncManager [36]

  • remove unused objc compat code on OWSUDManagerImpl [37]

  • remove unused objc compat in OWSURLSession [38]

  • Correctly mark 'incoming answered elsewhere' calls as accepted. [39]

  • remove objc compat from ObservedDatabaseChanges [40]

  • remove objc compat code from PaymentsFormat [41]

  • remove non-thread-switching firstly that returns guarantees [42]

  • Clear reglock token when clearing other SVR state [43]

  • Fix formatting of retry timer for times longer than an hour [44]

  • Split SVRKeyDeriver pieces into MasterKey + SVRLocalStorage [45]

  • Add support for supplying explicit credentials to storage service request [46]

  • convert Paypal+API from promises to async-await [47]

  • Handle undownloadable attachment rendering [48]

  • Wipe transit tier info if we fail download with a 404 [49]

  • Simplify disableAiWritingTools [50]

  • Remove handling for unsupported messages [51]

  • Clean up auth types for story/group messages [52]

  • Move fallback ViewOnceMessages logic trigger [53]

  • Add limit to view once auto-expiration query [54]

  • Don’t handle multi-recipient 404s [55]

  • Update LibSignal to v0.66.1 [56]

  • Asyncify various PNI managers [57]

  • Add option to crash on owsFailDebug in nightlies [58]

  • Make logging for invalid attachment proto content type more specific [59]

  • Use the already defined type information when building an attachment for sharing. [60]

  • Fix flakiness in BlockingManagerTests [61]

  • A couple string tweaks [62]

  • More permissive sticker-attachment rendering [63]

  • Fix typo in comment [64]

  • Allow nullable profile fields to be nil [65]

  • Update release notes [66]

  • Update translations [67]

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
This issue happened around two weeks ago:
Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.45 release - #32 by Xashyar

And I had to forgo losing all my data on iPhone, in order to log back in to my account :/, through a fresh install.

After many failed tries, re-linking the iPad finally worked. Albeit now I can reproduce this crash more consistently (already submitted system logs via iOS).
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.47.0/45b7c1eea39cd112d288d880d2dec81dabc6d9cc2eaa22d70149d760c59ea50a.zip

The steps are easy to reproduce,

  1. Settings → Privacy → Advanced → Crash!

After multiple crashes the account eventually gets unregistered / logged out:
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.47.0/48f5b5a029f3ad83530f65191c8ce23ab3030f1c84cb35a0d6b0968b9e368aa6.zip

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.45 release

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
Today I got to re-register Signal again after a few days:

  1. But Signal crashed once during registration:
    https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.47.0/f6b27fcf3008f992f3ad6773ba0cd8229c0d9b600ffd31aac3c697760a96e129.zip

  2. After entering the PIN, None of my groups returned even though all group members see me as a contact and therefore can’t add me again:
    https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.47.0/d8f0a9d0b0192154955d692f1423aef17401bdc10b7ff8738535a679fdec2b02.zip

  3. Most of my contacts now show only as phone numbers with no contact names, and when I open the chat with those numbers they immediately show as “Deleted Account”:
    https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.47.0/32255ca25d3c17de7cbb25b2a42a8cf6b7b0924659fa8b5d13ee4f409f37593a.zip

  4. iPad still crashes as reported above, I have sent several logs via iOS itself.

posts.name: Xashyar
posts.cooked:
This is the registration problem I’m experiencing:

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.46.0/c78b73877cd09731da612802e8cc21b4d8432d68906180b2c811dd0ca65c8def.zip

Untitled632×1080 14.3 KB

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Thanks for the reports, and I’m sorry you’ve had so many strange issues. It’s possible that not all features are behaving properly under either the censorship circumvention or proxy.

For the time being, I’ve fixed the crash you experienced when opening advanced privacy settings, including that fix in 7.47. Hopefully that mitigates the other issues you’ve run into downstream.

Thanks as always for being a beta tester, and for highlighting that crash!

New Version: 7.47.0.624-beta

2 new commits since 7.47.0.618-beta:

  • Update translations [1]

  • Avoid force-unwrap in AdvancedPrivacySettingsViewController [2]

This bug appears in 7.46 and 7.47: Unable to set group icon

Edit: Here it doesn’t appear to change on the desktop either, it does for OP in above post.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: Hi, thanks for the report. I’m able to reproduce this, and we’ll take a look.
Thank you! Hopefully it can be fixed.

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.48 release.
